{{cpp/io/basic_stringstream/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=sstream|1=
template&lt; 
    class CharT, 
    class Traits = std::char_traits&lt;CharT&gt;,
    class Allocator = std::allocator&lt;CharT&gt;
&gt; class basic_stringstream
    : public basic_iostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;;
}}

The class template {{tt|std::basic_stringstream}} implements input and output operations on string based streams. It effectively stores an instance of {{lc|std::basic_string}} and performs the input and output operations on it.

At the low level, the class essentially wraps a raw string device implementation of {{lc|std::basic_stringbuf}} into a higher-level interface of {{lc|std::basic_iostream}}. The complete interface to unique {{lc|std::basic_stringbuf}} members is provided.
